lines.text: Your order sir?

[indicates Natlia's drink]
I'll have one of those.
One Istanbul Express.
Yes. A double.

[suprised]
A double? Nobody orders the double, sir!
Okay. Make it a triple.

[sitting up in the snow after falling from a cable broken by the KGB]
I think they're gone! We can move now!
I... may... never... move... again.
[collapses into snow]
Have you seen this report on this Condorman? On this man Wilkins? He is an AMATEUR, do you hear? He is NOT an agent of the CIA! He is a WRITER OF COMIC BOOKS!
Who can save Princess Juliet - held captive by the evil Count Lorca? Who can save the city? Who?
[pauses to put on goggles; in a deeper voice]
Who... this is a job - for CONDORMAN!

[as Condorman drops into the Seine]
Flap, Woody! Flap!
Woody, you're a great cartoonist, and you're a great comic book writer - but you're a lousy bird.
Rupel for your thoughts...
[puts arm around Natalia]

[puts her arm around Woody]
When I parted from Krokov, I promised myself I would never love again... a man of deception. But now I know there is deception, and deception...
I don't understand...
But I do.
[smiles]
When I go to America, and reading the Sunday funnies, and eating my Big Mac, and planning for the senior prom...

[interupts]
You may have missed the prom...
...I would like it very much, if I could pick up my American telephone, call my friend Woody, and say... come over and be *diplomatic* with me.
[smiles coyly]
I'll bring the dip, if you bring the dostoevsky.
[looks at Woody, confused]
That's a yes.

[in Russ's office with Harry]
We have a Russian agent, who wants to defect. This agent required a specific person to handle the exchange. Now, we have been given the code name of the agent requested, but we've never heard of it. I want you to go through all the active agents, and find out who is using the code name, Condorman!
[flops down in the chair, stunned]
What's wrong?
I think I know... who's using that name.

[in Woody's drawing room, Russ and Harry have just explained to Woody what has been requested]
Are you serious?
Very.
I could get killed!
Come on, Woody, it's just a simple defection...
Simple defection for you, maybe! I just delivered some *simple* papers to Istanbul! Nearly got shish-ka-bobbed by three turkish behemoths!
We would safeguard your every move, Mr. Wilkins. The Bear is very important to us.
The Bear? Listen guys, I'm sorry. But I refuse to risk my life, especially for someone who goes under the name of The Bear! I'm sorry. I'm sorry,
[sits down at his desk]
I'm sorry.
[nods to Harry in a Talk Some Sense Into Him motion]

[sits down next to Woody]
Come on, Woody. You said it yourself, you'll never have Condorman do anything in your comics unless it has been tested and proven. Well now, here's your chance! Out of the storybooks, into real life! It's a chance of a lifetime, and we'll be with you every step of the way! Right Russ? Right... Russ?

[has moved to one of Woody's sketches on the wall. He takes a photo out of his jacket pocket, and compares it to the image]
. You know, Mr. Wilkins, we wouldn't even be asking you to do this, if it wasn't for the fact that The Bear, insisted on you being the escort.
Well, how would The Bear know about me?
Because, you've already met her. In Istanbul. Natalia Rombovia. Of the KGB.

[stands]
Natalia?

[Woody shows Russ and Harry his sketches on what he will need for the mission]
No. No. No. Absoubtly not.
Now hang on a minute! You said we would do it my way with my designs!
Yes, but this is going to cost a fortune!
OK. If I don't get what I need, then I don't get The Bear!
Over to you, Russ.
Well, I don't... I don't know.
Ah, and if all else fails, we are prepared, Russ. We can always go to *Plan B*.
Hmm. OK. Harry, get these down to R & D right away!
Right away, Russ!
Have everything set up, I want to move on this right away!
Right!
I want you there, yesterday! Plan B.

[after Russ leaves]
What's Plan B, Harry?
I don't know. But I hope to have it ready before you get to Yugoslavia.

[Natalia has just discovered that Woody is not a real agent]
Harry, who are you?
Huh?

[holds up one of Woody's comic books]
Woody is Condorman, I am Laser Lady! Who are you?

[looking resigned]
How'd ya find out?

[indicating the gaggle of children around her]
The children here read comic books, too.

[sighs]
Let's take a walk.
Condorman - vulture of the Western world.
[takes drink, looks surprised, spews jet of flame]

[after accidentally firing his machine-gun walking stick]
That's a hair-trigger!

[turns on the lamp]
Hello, Natalia. Welcome home.
Sergei. I didn't expect you.
I'm sure you didn't, my dear. Nor did I expect you to travel to Istanbul to meet our American friend.
As I was going to tell you about. The meeting was supposed to be a civillian operation, eh? They sent a *top* agent. He was good.
[steps behind the dressing screen to change clothes]
. Very smooth. And very tough. Almost as tough as you, Sergei.
And his name? Surely, when you were finding out how... tough... and how smooth he was, you found out his name?
He called himself Condorman.

Condorman? Quaint. But he is good. The way he handled those three turks was impressive. But, you were stupid to be seen by a chinese agent. And I cannot afford costly mistakes. Oh, my dear Natalia, that is why I have changed my mind about taking you with me to Monte Carlo. You need to be... re-educated, on the, teachings, of our masters.

[Woody looks in his side-view mirror and sees a group of black cars quickly coming up behind them. He nudges Natalia]
Natalia!
What is it?

[points at her side-view mirror]
You tell me.
The Brocknoviach!
[observes the group of cars are almost to the truck's bumper now]
We cannot outrun them in this old truck!
You have a point there. But!

[presses a button on the console, which causes the truck bench seat to lower into a hidden compartment. The dashboard lights up with camera angles, display readouts, RPM and spedometer displays; a hidden vehicle under the truck chasis]

[looks around at the new surroundings]
Incredible!
[Woody presses a few buttons on the console, and the Condor car detaches itself from the antique truck chasis and races off]
Fantastic!

[the Brocknoviach drivers have begun to ram the back of the Condor car]
. What do we do now?
Well, we push another button...
[Woody presses another series of buttons on the dash, and then the activate switch on his steering wheel, which activates an oil slick, causing some of the cars to flip and crash into each other]

[the remaining cars continue to ram the back of the Condor car]
Who are those guys?
The Brocknoviach is a elite pursuit squadron. Superb drivers, each one a dedicated killer.

[Woody presses another series of buttons and the activate switch on the steering wheel, which shoots flames out of the back, causing most of the remaining cars to crash but one]
Ugh!
Do something!
There's nothing left to do!

[the last car pulls around on Natalia's side, rolls down his window and flips up his helmet visor, revealing one solid iron glass eye and one glaring human eye]
Morovich!
You know that guy?
He's a homicidal maniac!

[in disguise as a wealthy sheik, Woody approaches Natalia on an outcropping of the estate]
A thing of beauty!
Yes it is. I do not believe we have met. Natalia Rombovia.
[holds out her hand to shake]

[takes off his sunglasses and whispers]
Don't scream out, the calvary's here!

[surprised]
Woo...!
Shhh!
[gently places his hand over her mouth]

[whispering]
Woody! They told me you were dead!
I've come to get you out. Come on!
[reaches to take her hand]

[sees Krokov looking her way]
No. I cannot go with you.
What do you mean?
Krokov will...
Krokov, forget Krokov! Now come with me!
No! No! Krokov...
[sees Krokov walking towards them, and calms down]

Krokov had a plan. It was a plan. Don't be stupid. Krokov thought you were a top agent. My defection was a ruse. To kidnap you. But now he knows you are nothing but a foolish dreamer who draws comic books, not worth the bullet to kill you. So go now, please, and don't...

[interupts]
I see you have already met the shiek.
Yes. He thought we had met before!
Is that so?
But I was... mistaken. A foolish dream, perhaps.

[walks away and takes Krokov's arm]
It was a pleasure meeting you. I'm sorry we didn't have more time. Some other day, perhaps.
[Woody nods, Natalia turns to leave with Krokov, then turns back momentarily]
If you bring the dip, I'll bring the dostoevsky!

[looks away, heartbroken, then realizes Natalia's hidden message]
I'll bring the dip...
[smiles]
I'll bring the dip... Natalia!

[looking at his watch]
5, 4, 3, 2, 1...
[presses a button on his remote which sets off a series of detonations]

[both stand on a balcony with no way down]
We're trapped!
Don't you believe it!
Woody, I'm frightened!
Don't worry...
[begins to take off his robe and beard]
Condorman has it all figured out!
But how will we escape? Fly?
[Woody discards his robe and unlocks two handles on his backpack, revealing giant wings]
You are not serious?
You want out?

[goes to him, hugging him tightly]
I want you!
Then get behind me, and hold on tight!

[Natalia, Harry and Woody are hiding in a church, admist the attendees for a wedding. Natalia sees Morovich and his henchman storm in and begin searching the crowd]
I wish to speak!

[stops with the wedding ceremony]
Yes?

[points]
This man is already married!
To whom?
To me.
What?
Come home, Piedro, please? For the sake of the children!

[looks to his bride to be]
She's lying! She's nothing but a liar! She's crazy!
I wish I was! But Piedro Junior cries for his father!
You will leave here at once!
I will not! Uncle Luigi and I have come to take you home!
I will remove you myself!
[grabs Natalia]
Don't you lay a hand on me!
Who will stop me?

[points to Morovich]
Uncle Luigi!
I will make short work of this *Uncle Luigi*!
[the groom and Morovich start fighting, while Natalia, Harry and Woody slip out the back]

[Woody and Natalia have just landed to meet Harry at the rendezvious]
Hurry, Harry! There almost on us!

[grabs life vests and hands one to Woody]
Here!

[Woody starts to put the vest on Natalia]
Why did you come to get me? You could have left me at the villa!

[wrenches the life vest straps as he puts it on Natalia to get her attention]
Why did you pretend like you didn't want to come?
I didn't want you to be killed! If I had asked you to help me, you might have gone off and done something stupid!

[sarcastically]
Instead of the smart and sensible thing we're doing right now!
But what about all that stuff about me being a... foolish dreamer who draws comic books, huh?
Did I say that?
Uh huh.

[caresses Woody's cheek]
Laser Lady would say anything to save the man she loves.

[Woody and Natalia begin to kiss, Harry whistles loudly, stopping them]
Will you two come on?
On the boat, Natalia!
[Harry, Natalia and Woody board a boat dock, and take stairs down to a floating garage. Two curtains open and the Condor boat rockets out]

[Harry arrives at the train station and looks for Woody. He spots him, wearing a trenchcoat, sunglasses and fedora pacing the loading platform. Harry walks up to Woody and taps him on the shoulder]
What are you doing?

[doing his Bogart impersonation]
Of all the stations, in all the worlds... you like?
I hate. Gimmie the hat and trenchcoat.
What? No!
Woody, you were hired because you're a civilian! Try to take it easy with the Bogart schtick.
[Harry takes the fedora and sunglasses]
OK. But leave me the coat, please? It gives me confidence.
OK. Here, hold out your arm.
[cuffs a briefcase to Woody's wrist]
Ohhhhh! Oh, I like it, Harry! I like it!
I knew you would.
[hands Woody the briefcase]
Thanks, Harry. And don't worry, I won't let the organization down.
Do me a favor, will ya Woody? Get on the train, order a stiff drink, stay out of trouble?
Right. Right.

[hears the station operator announcing the train departure]
OK, that's you, better get aboard. Here's your ticket, and your passport.

[takes the items]
Wait, Harry. Where do I get off again?
At the end of the line, Woody. Istanbul.

[has taken the fedora from Harry's pocket, and puts it on]
Istanbul.
Oooooooohhhhh! Way to go, Russ! He got it exactly right!
What is it?
I'll show you!
[unpacks the jet trolly]
See, you just, hook it onto the cable, then you open the stirrups, climb aboard, flip this switch, and Zowee! Right up the mountain!
Whoa... hold on!
Harry, there's nothing to be afraid of.
Woody... I can't handle heights.
OK. Then you climb on with me, and hold on.

[climbs on]
Whhhooooooaaaaaa!
[holds on to Woody for dear life, squinting his eyes shut]
Ready?
[she flips the switch for Woody, and the jet trolly takes off. Natalia then gets on hers, flips the switch and is right behind Woody and Harry]

[Krokov, on the mountaintop, watches the three crossing the Alps. He picks up his radio]
Morovich? Do you see them?

[Morovich, a little lower on the mountain, is on an outcropping with a sniper gun]
Da.
[He target's Woody and Harry's jet trolly at the junction where the pole and the wheels on the cable meet]
Shoot.

[a shot rings out and Harry and Woody fall to the snowy embankment below, leaving impressions in the snow upon impact. There is no movement from either of them]
Woody! Wooooddddyyyyyy!

[Krokov walks into Natalia's room]
. I hate you.

I am going to save your life. Our story will be that your defection was a ruse to kidnap this Condorman. Our agencies in Monte Carlo and Yugoslavia have already been informed. The failure, however, will fall on Morovich. Of course, we will have to have him killed. We certaintly can't have him going off telling his side of the story. Hmm?
You pig! Do you think that things will ever be the same again between us?
For the moment, I don't care. But remember, Natalia, while you are here in this comfortable, but inpenetrable fortress, your every move will be watched.
Get out of here!
Well?
I got some information on Natalia.
Tell me!
Krokovk's got her. He's holding her at the embassy on the border of Monte Carlo.
We've gotta get to her, Harry!
Woody, wait. We also got new orders. We've been ordered back to the U.S. The mission's considered a bust.
I can't go back. Not without Natalia. I love her, Harry.
I know.
Look, I've still got top rated clearance. That gives me access to anything I need, right?
Woody, that was before we were ordered back to the states!
I don't care about orders! Tell them you couldn't find me in time!
I can't do that, Woody.
All that matters, is Natalia.
